issue.title: Python: Conversion of nested data in pd.DataFrames to/from Arrow structures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-468](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-468). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add the support for "nested" columns between Pandas and Arrow, explicitly columns that consist of lists of varying length. As determining the schema here is even more complex, the user should provide the schema for the Pandas->Arrow conversion.
